actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Congress should immediately hold hearings and conduct an investigation to find facts necessary for the release of the American hostages in Iran.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that hearings should be held and an investigation should be conducted to find facts necessary for the release of the hostages in Iran.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Congress should immediately hold hearings and conduct an investigation to find facts necessary for the release of the American hostages in Iran.
